content: KHC Kwik-X Capsule Ultimate-performance adhesive capsule for Kwik-X Dual Action Anchor System for fastenings in concrete. In combination with KH-EZ screw anchors (sold separately) offers adhesive anchor performance with the installation speed of screw anchors. ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Chemical anchors- - - ### FEATURES:Features Unmatched combination of load capacity, productivity and simplicity – new dual-action technology combining the performance of adhesive anchors with the installation speed and simplicity of screw anchors Easier to install – SafeSet method and pre-configured adhesive capsules reduce the number of steps in the installation process and eliminate the need for accessories like brushes, air pumps and dispensers Up to 4x faster installation than injectable mortars – significantly reduce labor costs due to faster, easier setting with an impact driver, and possibility of immediate loading Extensive technical data including ESR for concrete, seismic category A-F – maximum application coverage and design flexibility fully supported by the PROFIS Engineering software suite Applications The Kwik-X Dual Action anchor comprises the KHC adhesive capsule and the KH-EZ screw anchor (please order separately) for high-performance anchoring of steel to concrete Fastening structural and non-structural steel baseplates to concrete Industrial fastenings – racking, machinery and other equipment ### TECHNICAL DATA: Approvals / Test reports: ICC-ES report (concrete), Seismic Base materials: Concrete (cracked), Concrete (uncracked) Base material temperature at installation - range: -18 - 104 °F Technical Data | Approvals / Test reports | ICC-ES report (concrete), Seismic | Base materials | Concrete (cracked), Concrete (uncracked) | Base material condition (as per approval) | Dry, Wet | Base material temperature at installation - range | -18 - 104 °F | Type of fixing | Through-fastening | Installation direction | All | Tested/approved for diamond drilling | Yes, with DD 30-W | SAFEset | Yes | Cleaning procedures | Automatic Cleaning (SafeSet Hollow Drill Bit), Compressed-Air Cleaning, Non Cleaning | Installation tools | SIW 4AT-22 ½” Cordless impact wrench, SIW 6-22 ½” Cordless impact wrench | Removable | Yes | In-service temperature – range | -40 - 176 °F | Storage and transportation temperature range | 41 - 77 °F | PROFIS Software | Yes | IBC compliance | IBC 2015, IBC 2018, IBC 2021 ### ITEMS- 2362252 - Kwik-X capsule KHC 1/2“ LARGE - Package Size 25 pc Package Contents: - 1x KHC 1/2 Large Adhesive capsule - 3835588 - KHC 1/2“ LARGE MC (750 PC) - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 750x KHC 1/2 Large Adhesive capsule - 3835589 - KHC 1/2“ LARGE HALF-PALLET (9000 PC) - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 9000x KHC 1/2 Large Adhesive capsule - 3835590 - KHC 1/2“ LARGE PALLET (18000 PC) - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 18000x KHC 1/2 Large Adhesive capsule -
